snippet.title: Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark - Official Release Date Trailer [Fantasy RPG]
snippet.description:
Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark is coming April 30th on PC, PS4, and Xbox One! Pre-orders are available now on the Xbox Live, and PlayStation stores!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/699170/Fell_Seal_Arbiters_Mark/
PS4 (US): https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP2769-CUSA13315_00-FELLSEALPSID2018
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/fell-seal-arbiters-mark/9pbs8m93f1bf?activetab=pivot%3Aoverviewtab

Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark is a turn-based tactical RPG with a focus on storytelling and strategic battles. Unfold a mature story as you progress through hand-crafted scenarios, controlling your own group of Arbiters, with each character customizable from a wide selection of classes and abilities!
